name: IES Simulator
description:
IES Simulator (Formerly 6E Simulator)

WHAT IS THIS?
This is a school simulator based on IES Eskilstuna. Run around in the corridors, make some friends and gather apple awards.

HOW TO PLAY?
Browser: Go to the GameJolt page linked below, hit play and wait for it to load!
Download(Windows): Download and extract the folder. Inside, there is a .exe file.
Start that!

WHO MADE THIS?
Made by Hampus and Filip (7E)

More regular updates on the gamejolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/6esimulator/253852
